td.content: s:78 yo female presents with chronic Kidney. o:Height 157 cm, Weight 44.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.

s:a white f aged 80 Ys with C/O Kidney for 6 weeks that is frequent. o:Height 157 cm, Weight 44.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.
